newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stocks open slightly mixed after sales data.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stocks open slightly mixed after sales data.

text.p: Wall Street stocks opened mixed on Wednesday, with the Dow slightly lower and the Nasdaq climbing.
Stocks were not seen affected by the higher-than-expected 1.3 percent rise in U.S. chain store sales for the week ended August 31. July Construction figures were due at 1400 GMT.
The Dow industrials opened down two points at 5,546. The NASDAQ Index was up three at 1,145, while the S&P Index was off 0.2 at 654.5.
In U.S. Treasuries, the long bond was off 5/32 to yield 7.07 percent.
